document_name: Carbon sequestration in the desertified rangelands of Hossein Abbad.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/IRN/00013110/Carbon sequestration in the desertified rangelands of Hossein Abbad.pdf

outputs.output_descr: To develop and demonstrate a participatory rangeland rehabilitation model to increase carbon sequestration potentialities of desertified rangelands while improving socio economic conditions of the local communities.

Expected outputs: (1) Knowledge sharing on rural development approaches ensures. (2) Community of Project of the Focal Points established to institutionalize awareness raising and knowledge sharing among projects. (3) Empowerment of rural women towards achieving higher incomes and sustainable livelihoods. (4) Project management, monitoring and evaluation.

Objective (as defined in project logframe): To develop and demonstrate a participatory rangeland rehabilitation model to increase carbon sequestration potentialities of desertified rangelands while improving socio economic conditions of the local communities

project_descr: Carbon Sequestration in the Desertified Rangelands of Hossein Abbad
project_title: Carbon Sequestration in the Desertified Areas -Pims 899
